title: Top Places to visit in Chengalpattu, Tamil Nadu
content: Chengalpattu is a town in Chengalpattu district at the State of Tamil Nadu, India. It is the headquarters of the district and is 56 kilometres (35 mi) southwest of the state capital, Chengalpattu and 41 km Away from Chennai City Entrance Gateway Meenambakkam on the National Highway 45. Chengalpat
